newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore bunkers steady with moderate enquiries.
newsitem.headline: Singapore bunkers steady with moderate enquiries.

text.p: Singapore bunker levels held steady on Wednesday and traders said levels were supported by moderate enquiries.

Sentiment has been improved since last week over the slow off-port-limit bunkering but suppliers were cautious in raising their offers. Bunker 380-cst supplies were quoted at around $101 per tonne and the 180-cst grade was at about $104. "Actual traded levels may be slightly lower later but overall the market is better than in previous months," said one trader.
MDO and gas oil stabilised at around $160 and $173 per tonne respectively. --Singapore Newsroom (65-870 3571)
